hero.title: D23 AI Integrations
hero.description: Discover the power of AI-driven conversations with seamless integrations across platforms, services, and tools that matter to you.

features.name: Conversational AI
features.description: General chat, Q&A, explanations, brainstorming, and task assistance.
features.details: Engage in natural conversations for questions, answers, explanations, brainstorming, and task assistance.
features.howToUse: Ask questions or give instructions. Add context, constraints, or examples for better results.

features.name: Search
features.description: Search the internet or read specific webpages for information.
features.details: Enables the Internet or search for information that may be outside the model's knowledge, or that is evolving.
features.howToUse: Provide a query and optionally a URL if you have insights into return.

features.name: Quiz
features.description: Play fun quizzes on any topic in single or multiplayer mode.
features.details: Play quizzes on any topic of your choice in single-player or multiplayer mode.

features.name: Train Features
features.description: Check live train status, schedules, PNR status, and trains between stations.
features.details: Inquire live running status (current location, ETA) for upcoming stations, status, info, check trains between stations.
features.howToUse: For live status: mention and (optionally) the journey date if not today, e.g., 'Live status for 12954' OR 'Live status for 12954 on 2025-12-04'. For PNR: 'Check PNR 1234567890'
